Name: Slime Research
About the game: Ooze through the world! Ooze through physics-based puzzles with your squishy slime body Split into 2 Slimes, by moving joysticks in opposite directions Play with Keyboard, Gamepad, or Mouse-Only Create custom levels with the included level editor Steam Workshop support for Custom Levels
